inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Longsword', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Bastard Sword', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Greatsword', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Master Training, Large Swords
description: You do an additional 1x damage on critical hits with longswords, bastard swords, and great swords.
